unpublishedAction.name: updateMarriageProfile
jsonPathKeys:
{ 
	spouseFullName: nameField.inputText,
	spouseDateOfBirth: dobField.formattedDate,
	dateOfMarriage: domField.formattedDate,
	spouseId: idField.inputText,
	spouseContact: contactField.inputText,
	spouseEmail: emailField.inputText,
	marriageType: selectMarriageType.selectedOptionValue,
	marriageCertificate: "",
	marriageContract: "",
	userId: appsmith.store.jwt,
	rowIndex: getMarriageProfile.data[0].rowIndex
}
